verses.text: Now therefore hearken , O Israel , unto the statutes and unto the judgments , which I teach you, for to do \add them\add*, that ye may live , and go in and possess the land which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of your fathers giveth you.

Ye shall not add unto the word which I command you, neither shall ye diminish \add ought\add* from it, that ye may keep the commandments of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God which I command you.

Your eyes have seen what the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* did because of Baal-peor : for all the men that followed Baal-peor , the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath destroyed them from among you.
But ye that did cleave unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God \add are\add* alive every one of you this day.
Behold , I have taught you statutes and judgments , even as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my God commanded me, that ye should do so in the land whither ye go to possess it.

Keep therefore and do \add them;\add* for this \add is\add* your wisdom and your understanding in the sight of the nations , which shall hear all these statutes , and say , Surely this great nation \add is\add* a wise and understanding people.

For what nation \add is there so\add* great , who \add hath\add* God \add so\add* nigh unto them, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our God \add is\add* in all \add things that\add* we call upon him \add for\add*?
And what nation \add is there so\add* great , that hath statutes and judgments \add so\add* righteous as all this law , which I set before you this day ?

Only take heed to thyself, and keep thy soul diligently , lest thou forget the things which thine eyes have seen , and lest they depart from thy heart all the days of thy life : but teach them thy sons , and thy sons’ sons ;

\add Specially\add* the day that thou stoodest before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God in Horeb , when the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* said unto me, Gather me the people together , and I will make them hear my words , that they may learn to fear me all the days that they shall live upon the earth , and \add that\add* they may teach their children.
And ye came near and stood under the mountain ; and the mountain burned with fire unto the midst of heaven , with darkness , clouds , and thick darkness.\f + \fr 4.11 \ft midst: Heb. heart\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto you out of the midst of the fire : ye heard the voice of the words , but saw no similitude ; only \add ye heard\add* a voice.\f + \fr 4.12 \ft only…: Heb. save a voice\f*
And he declared unto you his covenant , which he commanded you to perform , \add even\add* ten commandments ; and he wrote them upon two tables of stone. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* commanded me at that time to teach you statutes and judgments , that ye might do them in the land whither ye go over to possess it.

Take ye therefore good heed unto yourselves ; for ye saw no manner of similitude on the day \add that\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto you in Horeb out of the midst of the fire :
Lest ye corrupt \add yourselves\add*, and make you a graven image , the similitude of any figure , the likeness of male or female ,
The likeness of any beast that \add is\add* on the earth , the likeness of any winged fowl that flieth in the air ,
The likeness of any thing that creepeth on the ground , the likeness of any fish that \add is\add* in the waters beneath the earth :

And lest thou lift up thine eyes unto heaven , and when thou seest the sun , and the moon , and the stars , \add even\add* all the host of heaven , shouldest be driven to worship them, and serve them, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God hath divided unto all nations under the whole heaven.\f + \fr 4.19 \ft divided: or, imparted\f*

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath taken you, and brought you forth out of the iron furnace , \add even\add* out of Egypt , to be unto him a people of inheritance , as \add ye are\add* this day.

Furthermore the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* was angry with me for your sakes , and sware that I should not go over Jordan , and that I should not go in unto that good land , which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God giveth thee \add for\add* an inheritance :
But I must die in this land , I must not go over Jordan : but ye shall go over , and possess that good land.

Take heed unto yourselves, lest ye forget the covenant of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God , which he made with you, and make you a graven image , \add or\add* the likeness of any \add thing\add*, which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy God hath forbidden thee.
For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God \add is\add* a consuming fire , \add even\add* a jealous God. \p

¶ When thou shalt beget children , and children’s children , and ye shall have remained long in the land , and shall corrupt \add yourselves\add*, and make a graven image , \add or\add* the likeness of any \add thing\add*, and shall do evil in the sight of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , to provoke him to anger :

I call heaven and earth to witness against you this day , that ye shall soon utterly perish from off the land whereunto ye go over Jordan to possess it; ye shall not prolong \add your\add* days upon it, but shall utterly be destroyed.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall scatter you among the nations , and ye shall be left few in number among the heathen , whither the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall lead you.
And there ye shall serve gods , the work of men’s hands , wood and stone , which neither see , nor hear , nor eat , nor smell.
But if from thence thou shalt seek the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , thou shalt find \add him\add*, if thou seek him with all thy heart and with all thy soul.

When thou art in tribulation , and all these things are come upon thee, \add even\add* in the latter days , if thou turn to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God , and shalt be obedient unto his voice ;\f + \fr 4.30 \ft are…: Heb. have found thee\f*
(For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God \add is\add* a merciful God ;) he will not forsake thee, neither destroy thee, nor forget the covenant of thy fathers which he sware unto them.

For ask now of the days that are past , which were before thee, since the day that God created man upon the earth , and \add ask\add* from the one side of heaven unto the other, whether there hath been \add any such thing\add* as this great thing \add is\add*, or hath been heard like it?
Did \add ever\add* people hear the voice of God speaking out of the midst of the fire , as thou hast heard , and live ?

Or hath God assayed to go \add and\add* take him a nation from the midst of \add another\add* nation , by temptations , by signs , and by wonders , and by war , and by a mighty hand , and by a stretched out arm , and by great terrors , according to all that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God did for you in Egypt before your eyes ?
Unto thee it was shewed , that thou mightest know that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* he \add is\add* God ; \add there is\add* none else beside him.
Out of heaven he made thee to hear his voice , that he might instruct thee: and upon earth he shewed thee his great fire ; and thou heardest his words out of the midst of the fire.
And because he loved thy fathers , therefore he chose their seed after them, and brought thee out in his sight with his mighty power out of Egypt ;
To drive out nations from before thee greater and mightier than thou \add art\add*, to bring thee in, to give thee their land \add for\add* an inheritance , as \add it is\add* this day.

Know therefore this day , and consider \add it\add* in thine heart , that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* he \add is\add* God in heaven above , and upon the earth beneath: \add there is\add* none else.

Thou shalt keep therefore his statutes , and his commandments , which I command thee this day , that it may go well with thee, and with thy children after thee, and that thou mayest prolong \add thy\add* days upon the earth , which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy God giveth thee, for ever. \p
¶ Then Moses severed three cities on this side Jordan toward the sunrising ;
That the slayer might flee thither, which should kill his neighbour unawares , and hated him not in times past ; and that fleeing unto one of these cities he might live :
\add Namely\add*, Bezer in the wilderness , in the plain country , of the Reubenites ; and Ramoth in Gilead , of the Gadites ; and Golan in Bashan , of the Manassites. \p
¶ And this \add is\add* the law which Moses set before the children of Israel :
These \add are\add* the testimonies , and the statutes , and the judgments , which Moses spake unto the children of Israel , after they came forth out of Egypt ,

On this side Jordan , in the valley over against Beth-peor , in the land of Sihon king of the Amorites , who dwelt at Heshbon , whom Moses and the children of Israel smote , after they were come forth out of Egypt :
And they possessed his land , and the land of Og king of Bashan , two kings of the Amorites , which \add were\add* on this side Jordan toward the sunrising ;
From Aroer , which \add is\add* by the bank of the river Arnon , even unto mount Sion , which \add is\add* Hermon ,
And all the plain on this side Jordan eastward , even unto the sea of the plain , under the springs of Pisgah.
